## Web3Tokens.erc721() method

Create a builder for an ERC-721 token witch allows to add extensions such as Ownable, Mintable, Pausable, etc...

**Signature:**

```typescript
erc721(): ERC721Builder;
```
**Returns:**

ERC721Builder
